Stock_GrantObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Stock_GrantObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Stock_GrantObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Grant Price and Grant Price Currency are only valid for unit based long term cash category grants. Please remove Grant Price and Grant Price Currency to proceed.

CurrencyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

CurrencyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

CurrencyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Grant Price and Grant Price Currency are only valid for unit based long term cash category grants. Please remove Grant Price and Grant Price Currency to proceed.
Expiration Date must be on or after the Vest From Date.
Options Pricing Factor can only be supplied if the grant is an Option:  [id]

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Number of shares vested. Applies to options or grants only.

validation.validation: The Shares Vested ([shares vested]) cannot be more than Shares Granted ([shares granted])
validation.description: Shares Vested cannot be more than Shares Granted.

validation.validation: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved option and stock category grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.

Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved option and stock category grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Number of shares unvested. Applies to options or grants only.

validation.validation: The Shares Unvested ([shares unvested]) must be less than or equal to the Shares Granted ([shares granted])
validation.description: Shares Unvested cannot be more than Shares Granted.

validation.validation: The Shares Vested ([shares vested]) plus the Shares Unvested ([shares unvested]) must be less than or equal to the Shares Granted ([shares granted])
validation.description: Shares Vested plus Shares Unvested cannot be greater than Shares Granted.

validation.validation: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved option and stock category grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.

Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved option and stock category grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: The price associated to the grant vesting date.

validation.validation: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.
validation.description: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants.

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: The most recent vesting date of the grant.

validation.validation: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants. Please remove Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.
validation.description: Shares Vested, Shares Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved stock grants.

validation.validation: Vested as of date cannot be before the vest from date.
validation.description: Vested as of date cannot be before the vest from date.

validation.validation: Vested as of date cannot be before the grant date.
validation.description: Vested as of date cannot be before the grant date.

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Amount vested. Applies to long-term cash only.

validation.validation: Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved long term cash category grants. Please remove Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.

Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved long term cash category grants. Please remove Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of to proceed.
Long Term Cash Amount Vested cannot be more than Amount Granted.

Update_Stock_Grant_Data.description: Amount unvested. Applies to long-term cash only.

validation.validation: Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved long term cash category grants. Please remove Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.

Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of are only valid for board approved long term cash category grants. Please remove Long Term Cash Amount Vested, Long Term Cash Amount Unvested, Vesting Price, and Vested As Of, or update Board Approval to proceed.
Long Term Cash Amount Vested plus Long Term Cash Amount Unvested cannot be greater than Amount Granted.
Long Term Cash Amount Unvested cannot be more than Amount Granted.
